game.name: Elsa Restaurant Breakfast Management 2
game.description:
After creating an amazing success story in her first restaurant business, Elsa has recently decided to launch a new one. It is a summertime, so she wants to take its advantage by serving some refreshing and tasty drinks in the morning. Make sure that you follow breakfast recipe properly in order to create the optimum possible outcomes in the end of this free online cooking game for girls. Be alert, take every of your customers with an open mind and serve them as quickly as you can. 

Elsa Restaurant Breakfast Management 2 is an awesome kitchen game where your cooking and management skills will be tested to complete your goal successfully. Almost everyone loves coffee, which is known as a main course of a menu. At her restaurant, customers can enjoy a plan coffee or coffee with milk. Apart from this, she also offers cool lemonade or frappes. Every day she opens her restaurant with a new money target which she has to achieve in a limited amount of time by serving her clients. 

You will be declared as a winner after completing this money target shortly. There are various new more items to serve, such as the whipped cream, chocolate or croissants in the advanced level. You can also get a chance to collect some new tools as you progress in this brand new free online cooking game. The better your performance goes, the higher starts you will be able to collect in your rating. Check out all your stats in the upper part of the screen. Stay confident and cool to complete all the levels kids!
